txt.en: This key was used to seal away an archive in Khazad-dûm, but the holder of the key was slain and the key he bore was taken into Mordor. Forgotten, the dwarves that were sealed away survived as long as they could, but came in time to a sad end. You unlocked the door, and in so doing cleansed the key's corruption. Elrond has imbued it with the Light of Eärendil, and believes it will help you banish the shadows of Mordor.
